mapper.select: SELECT b.bookid , b.title , b.author , b.price , b.isbn , b.publish FROM book b WHERE b.bookid = #{bookId}
SELECT b.bookid , b.title , b.author , b.price , b.isbn , b.publish FROM book b ORDER BY b.bookid
SELECT b.bookid , b.title , b.author , b.price , b.isbn , b.publish FROM book b WHERE #{high} > b.price AND b.price > #{low} ORDER BY b.bookid
SELECT b.bookid , b.title , b.author , b.price , b.isbn , b.publish FROM book b WHERE b.title LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' ORDER BY b.bookid
